at.edu.hti.shop.domain.shipping.impl

Class DefaultShippmentCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.edu.hti.shop.domain.shipping.impl.DefaultShippmentCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShippmentCreator

    public class DefaultShippmentCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShippmentCreator
    default implementation of IShippmentCreator. this basic algorithm just separates items to be shipped into product categories (different shipping mode) and for each shipping mode at least on delivery is created. Check if some OrderLine can be added to delivery is done line based. An improvement could be to do this per piece because in case weight of OrderLine exceeds IDelivery#MAX_WEIGHT these items are not shippable at all.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    nickl
